name: Traction Prototype
description:
Concept:

Traction is a steampunk 2D platformer where the player controls a train that adds tracks ahead of itself while moving. 
The goal is to get from the start to the finish, thus constructing a train track for future trains to reuse.

Controls:

right arrow key: starts moving and adds a straight track
up arrow key: adds an upwards turning track
down arrow key: adds a downwards turning track
f: stops adding tracks (free fall)
space: stops moving
Esc: pause menu, from where the main menu can be reaccessed.
left-click mouse button: presses within menus and the restart button at the top right during gameplay.
